summary: REQ-3 appears to be implemented: the diff summary for `frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx` and the updated `frontend-file-summaries.txt` explicitly describe rendering the category tag as a bottom-right overlay within the thumbnail with a semi-transparent background for readability. However, because `ChatroomCard.tsx` is truncated, some acceptance-criteria details (e.g., explicit removal of the old under-title tag and explicit non-overlap logic with the LIVE badge) cannot be fully verified from the provided excerpt.

hallucinated_features.description: Enhanced dynamic thumbnail handling (YouTube/Twitch/Twitter/X thumbnail fetching including Twitter oEmbed requests and Twitch thumbnail availability probing) added to ChatroomCard beyond the requested category-overlay UI change.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest only asks to reposition the existing category tag overlay within the thumbnail; it explicitly constrains this to a UI-only change and does not request new thumbnail fetching logic or external oEmbed fetching.
evidence: frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx (adds Twitch thumbnail fetching via `getTwitchThumbnailUrl` and `new Image()` probe; adds Twitter oEmbed `fetch` to publish.twitter.com and parsing HTML for image src)
frontend-file-summaries.txt (describes Twitch/Twitter dynamic thumbnail enhancements in `frontend/src/components/ChatroomCard.tsx`)
